text: Proud to see 9 UAMS physicians named Healthcare Research All-Stars! 🎉👨‍⚖️👨‍⚕️Their dedication to research & innovation in orthopaedic surgery, gastrointestinal surgery, and general surgery is truly inspiring. 💡🏥 It's a testament to the excellence of UAMS & its commitment to providing top-notch patient care. 🙌
